name: Saplink (Maryville Game Design)
description:
Movement: WASD
Interaction: Space

FINAL CUTSCENE IS NOT WORKING, WILL FIX LATER.

A science experiment gone wrong has left a massive tree growing atop the Earth, leaving a majority of the Northern Hemisphere uninhabitable.
Play as Seedboy, another experiment created to control plants. Using your roots, take control of various foliage in a quest to stop the massive tree.
